input:
AC Milan 0 - 0 Atalanta

First Half:

00:01 Event: Kick-off by AC Milan
00:23 Event: Ball out of play
00:32 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
01:09 Event: Foul by Atalanta
02:16 Event: Direct free-kick by AC Milan
02:23 Event: Foul by AC Milan
02:46 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
03:04 Event: Ball out of play
03:18 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
03:23 Event: Ball out of play
03:37 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
04:19 Event: Ball out of play
04:25 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
04:27 Event: Ball out of play
04:36 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
04:48 Event: Foul by AC Milan
05:16 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
05:31 Event: Ball out of play
05:37 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
05:55 Event: Ball out of play
06:23 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
06:56 Event: Ball out of play
07:12 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
07:45 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
07:46 Event: Ball out of play
08:02 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
09:05 Event: Foul by Atalanta
09:09 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
09:17 Event: Offside by AC Milan
09:42 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
10:19 Event: Ball out of play
10:39 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
11:10 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
11:11 Event: Ball out of play
11:17 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
11:31 Event: Ball out of play
11:31 Caption: Boukary Drame (Atalanta) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
11:41 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
11:45 Event: Foul by Atalanta
12:01 Caption: Luca Cigarini (Atalanta) does well to dispossess the attacker with a slide tackle, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. Free kick. AC Milan will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.
12:03 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
12:17 Event: Ball out of play
12:35 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
12:41 Caption: Andrea Poli (AC Milan) fails to pick a body out in the box with an over-hit cross to the back post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Atalanta.
12:42 Event: Ball out of play
13:08 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
13:29 Event: Ball out of play
13:35 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
13:53 Caption: Andrea Poli (AC Milan) and M'Baye Niang attempt to exchange short two-yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
14:12 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) tries to send the ball in front of the goal, but the opposition's defence averts the threat.
14:15 Event: Ball out of play
14:22 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
14:41 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) whips the ball into the penalty area, but one of the defenders is alert and spanks it away.
14:44 Event: Ball out of play
14:53 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
15:15 Event: Ball out of play
15:34 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
15:37 Event: Ball out of play
15:53 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
16:05 Caption: Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Luca Antonelli (AC Milan) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
16:35 Event: Ball out of play
16:35 Caption: Andrea Poli (AC Milan) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. AC Milan force a corner. They send men into the box.
16:57 Event: Corner by AC Milan
16:59 Event: Ball out of play
17:05 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted. AC Milan have a corner.
17:13 Event: Corner by AC Milan
17:16 Event: Shots off target by AC Milan
17:23 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
17:46 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) tries to find Mauricio Pinilla, but he puts too much power on the pass.
17:55 Event: Ball out of play
18:02 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
18:14 Caption: Boukary Drame (Atalanta) is asking for medical treatment after picking up an injury.
18:54 Caption: Problems for Edoardo Reja as Boukary Drame is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Gianpaolo Bellini (Atalanta) replaces him.
19:07 Event: Substitution by Atalanta
19:26 Event: Ball out of play
19:34 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
19:36 Event: Ball out of play
19:54 Event: Ball out of play
20:13 Event: Foul by Atalanta
20:13 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) gets in a good position inside the box and is only inches away from getting on the end of a through ball from the edge of the area.
20:31 Caption: Cristian Raimondi (Atalanta) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Piero Giacomelli blows his whistle for a foul. AC Milan win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.
20:36 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
20:44 Event: Shots on target by AC Milan
20:45 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) breaks into the penalty area but his shot is blocked.
20:57 Event: Ball out of play
21:11 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
21:13 Caption: M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) cracks a first-time shot from inside the box, but it flies way wide of the left post.
21:56 Event: Ball out of play
22:00 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
22:15 Caption: Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan) sends a promising through ball, but the defence is alert and cuts out the pass.
22:18 Event: Ball out of play
22:29 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
22:47 Event: Foul by AC Milan
22:48 Caption: Poor challenge! M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) is penalised for tripping and Piero Giacomelli blows his whistle. It's a free kick to Atalanta in a dangerous position.
23:15 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
23:20 Caption: Marten de Roon (Atalanta) puts a cross into the box from the free kick but it's cleared.
23:27 Event: Ball out of play
23:34 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
23:39 Event: Ball out of play
23:46 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
23:52 Event: Foul by AC Milan
23:55 Caption: Yellow card. Mattia De Sciglio (AC Milan) goes into the referee's book after a bad challenge.
24:00 Event: Yellow card by AC Milan
24:29 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
24:38 Caption: Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan) attempts to create a scoring opportunity with a wonderful long ball, but his pass is blocked.
25:01 Caption: A pass by M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
25:38 Event: Foul by Atalanta
25:39 Caption: The foul by Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) was seen by Piero Giacomelli who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.
26:12 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
26:41 Caption: Great teamplay by Atalanta as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
27:26 Event: Ball out of play
27:26 Caption: Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan) slips past one challenge, but is unable to feed a low pass into the path of one of his teammates. The ball is out of play. Atalanta will take a throw-in.
27:38 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
28:01 Caption: The ball is cleared after M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
28:05 Event: Ball out of play
28:07 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
28:35 Event: Ball out of play
28:42 Caption: Luca Antonelli (AC Milan) looks to break free, but his touch lets him down and he loses the ball. The ball goes out of play and Atalanta will have a goal kick.
28:51 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
29:19 Event: Ball out of play
29:20 Caption: Good clearance! Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) received a low pass, but he didn't have time to do anything as one of the defenders quickly stole the ball off him. The ball goes out of play. AC Milan are awarded a corner kick.
29:41 Event: Corner by AC Milan
29:43 Event: Foul by AC Milan
29:48 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) takes the corner.
30:12 Caption: Piero Giacomelli blows his whistle and it's Philippe Mexes (AC Milan) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
30:15 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
30:29 Event: Foul by Atalanta
30:32 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
31:10 Event: Ball out of play
31:11 Caption: Luca Cigarini (Atalanta) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence quickly intercepts the ball. Atalanta have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
31:55 Event: Corner by Atalanta
32:00 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
32:00 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
32:17 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.
32:31 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
32:47 Caption: Gianpaolo Bellini (Atalanta) makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box and produces a poor effort that sails miles wide of the left post.
32:48 Event: Foul by AC Milan
33:05 Caption: Piero Giacomelli blows the whistle, Mattia De Sciglio (AC Milan) is penalised for a foul. Atalanta are awarded a free kick. Let's see what they create from this.
34:01 Caption: Papu Gomez (Atalanta) sends the ball into the penalty area from a free kick a few yards outside the box. The cross is good, but the goalkeeper shows himself in a good light as he leaps high to intercept the ball.
34:11 Event: Direct free-kick by Atalanta
34:16 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
34:42 Caption: Half-chance! Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) plays a pass into the box, but Gianluigi Donnarumma reacts well to snuff out the attack.
35:05 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
35:40 Caption: 3:4 - the latest stats for both teams in respect of shots on target.
35:58 Event: Foul by AC Milan
36:05 Caption: Piero Giacomelli interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan).
36:13 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
36:51 Event: Ball out of play
36:59 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
37:13 Event: Shots on target by AC Milan
37:15 Caption: M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) produced a promising shot towards the bottom right corner after his wonderful solo run, but Marco Sportiello thwarted him with a fabulous save.
37:21 Event: Shots off target by AC Milan
37:24 Event: Ball out of play
37:48 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
38:11 Event: Ball out of play
38:13 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
38:31 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
38:35 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
38:54 Event: Ball out of play
39:01 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear.
39:07 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
39:10 Event: Ball out of play
39:18 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
39:22 Event: Ball out of play
39:38 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
40:09 Event: Ball out of play
40:20 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
40:23 Event: Ball out of play
40:40 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
41:17 Event: Foul by Atalanta
41:22 Event: Yellow card by Atalanta
41:28 Caption: Piero Giacomelli shows a yellow card to Luca Cigarini (Atalanta) for a tough tackle.
41:50 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
42:10 Caption: Alberto Grassi (Atalanta) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
42:26 Event: Ball out of play
42:36 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
42:41 Event: Ball out of play
42:46 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
43:04 Event: Foul by AC Milan
43:06 Caption: Alessio Romagnoli (AC Milan) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent. Atalanta are given an advantage. They have a free kick.
43:53 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
43:55 Event: Foul by Atalanta
44:15 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.
44:34 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
45:57 Caption: Piero Giacomelli has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.
45:59 Caption: Let's hope the managers of both teams will be able to stir up the players as up till now the game has lacked any interesting or exciting moments. No side has really dominated in this first half. The home side is trying long passes and crosses into the box. The away side is creating their opportunities using lightning-fast counter-attacks.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Substitution by AC Milan
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Atalanta
00:00 Caption: There will be a minimum of 1 min. of added time.
00:01 Caption: The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
00:29 Caption: A substitution has been made. Mattia De Sciglio goes off and Davide Calabria (AC Milan) comes on.
00:42 Event: Offside by AC Milan
00:47 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) is caught offside!
00:50 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
01:25 Event: Ball out of play
01:27 Caption: Davide Calabria (AC Milan) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players.
01:33 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
01:43 Event: Foul by Atalanta
01:56 Caption: Atalanta concede a free kick following a bad challenge. AC Milan are awarded the free kick.
02:26 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
02:30 Caption: Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan) passes the ball and slows down the tempo so his team can continue with their combination play.
02:45 Event: Foul by Atalanta
02:48 Event: Yellow card by Atalanta
02:56 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Piero Giacomelli ignores the protests.
03:35 Caption: Looks like M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.
03:49 Caption: M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.
03:56 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) will take the free kick.
04:00 Event: Direct free-kick by AC Milan
04:03 Event: Offside by AC Milan
04:13 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) is flagged offside and it's not the first time today.
04:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
04:55 Event: Ball out of play
05:09 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
05:26 Event: Shots on target by AC Milan
05:28 Caption: M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) gets on the end of a pass on the edge of the penalty area and shoots towards the middle of the goal. He didn't put enough power into the effort, though, and Marco Sportiello pulls off an easy save.
06:10 Event: Foul by AC Milan
06:13 Caption: Piero Giacomelli blows his whistle after Andrea Poli (AC Milan) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. Atalanta will take a free kick.
06:55 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) puts a cross into the box from the free kick, but the defender gets there first.
07:00 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
07:06 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
07:08 Event: Foul by AC Milan
07:12 Caption: Juraj Kucka (AC Milan) performs a sliding tackle but catches his opponent's legs. The referee blows his whistle for an infringement. A free kick has been awarded to Atalanta.
07:51 Event: Direct free-kick by Atalanta
07:53 Event: Offside by Atalanta
07:58 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
08:18 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
08:24 Caption: Gabriel Paletta (Atalanta) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.
08:36 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
08:36 Event: Ball out of play
08:38 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) receives a well-played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. His effort sails well wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and AC Milan will have a goal kick.
08:45 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
09:07 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) sends a sweet pass into the penalty area, but one of the defenders averts the danger.
09:23 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
09:24 Event: Ball out of play
09:26 Caption: What a chance that is! Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) finds himself unmarked in a promising position after receiving a cross on the edge of the box and his attempt sails a whisker wide of the left post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for AC Milan.
09:37 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
09:52 Event: Ball out of play
09:57 Caption: The ball is cleared after M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
10:06 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
10:30 Event: Foul by Atalanta
10:37 Event: Yellow card by Atalanta
10:51 Caption: Yellow card! It's like Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) was asking for a caution with his behaviour. Piero Giacomelli agrees and books him.
11:13 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
11:34 Event: Ball out of play
11:38 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
11:43 Event: Ball out of play
11:47 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
12:08 Event: Ball out of play
12:24 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
12:29 Caption: A pass by Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
12:54 Event: Ball out of play
13:01 Caption: M'Baye Niang (AC Milan) did his best to latch on to a crossfield pass, but it was too long and it goes out of play.
13:08 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
13:37 Event: Shots on target by Atalanta
13:39 Event: Ball out of play
13:40 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) tries his luck from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort, but it is well blocked by the defender. The ball goes out of play and Atalanta have been awarded a corner kick.
13:50 Caption: Philippe Mexes (AC Milan) attempts to discuss the decision with Piero Giacomelli, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
13:51 Event: Yellow card by AC Milan
13:55 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts. The linesman makes the right call and Atalanta will have a corner.
14:10 Event: Corner by Atalanta
14:22 Event: Ball out of play
14:40 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.
14:41 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
14:43 Event: Ball out of play
14:54 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
15:19 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
15:20 Event: Ball out of play
15:22 Caption: Marten de Roon (Atalanta) collects a pass and strikes from about 30 metres out. It's a poor attempt which flies well over the bar. The ball goes out of play and AC Milan will have a goal kick.
15:30 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
16:09 Event: Ball out of play
16:11 Caption: Riccardo Montolivo (AC Milan) skips past his man but can't keep the ball in play. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Atalanta.
16:35 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
16:51 Event: Ball out of play
17:10 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
17:32 Event: Shots on target by Atalanta
17:33 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
17:33 Event: Ball out of play
17:39 Caption: What a save from Gianluigi Donnarumma! Luca Cigarini (Atalanta) jumps high to meet a cross and glances a promising low header from close range, but the goalkeeper pulls off a brilliant stop to keep it out.
17:59 Caption: Substitution. Juraj Kucka will be replaced by Luiz Adriano (AC Milan).
18:02 Event: Substitution by AC Milan
18:16 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
18:38 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
18:39 Event: Ball out of play
18:46 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) volleys the ball towards the right side of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a brilliant save to keep the ball out. The ball is out of play and Atalanta manage to earn a corner.
18:57 Event: Corner by Atalanta
19:01 Event: Ball out of play
19:23 Event: Corner by Atalanta
19:29 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
19:30 Event: Ball out of play
19:37 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
19:50 Caption: A big opportunity missed by Marten de Roon (Atalanta). He got on the ball inside the box and thumped a splendid first-time shot on goal, but it went narrowly wide of the right post.
19:54 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
20:22 Caption: The number of shots on goal at present is 3:4.
20:24 Event: Offside by AC Milan
20:30 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
20:30 Caption: The flag goes up and the referee blows his whistle - another offside by Carlos Bacca (AC Milan), who has already been caught several times today.
20:37 Event: Ball out of play
20:44 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
21:17 Event: Ball out of play
21:18 Caption: A pass by Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
21:39 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
21:45 Event: Foul by Atalanta
21:51 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
22:43 Caption: Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from AC Milan.
23:01 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
23:13 Event: Shots on target by Atalanta
23:17 Event: Foul by Atalanta
23:19 Caption: Alberto Grassi (Atalanta) was close to scoring a goal after unleashing a first-time effort from inside the six-yard box. The ball was aimed towards the middle of the net, but the goalkeeper read it well and pulled off a brilliant save to thwart the attempt.
23:49 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
24:17 Event: Ball out of play
24:20 Caption: Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) makes a driving run into the box but he cannot work any space for a shot. The ball goes out of play and AC Milan will have a goal kick.
24:38 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
25:37 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) plays a one-two with Maximiliano Moralez, but the move breaks down.
25:38 Event: Foul by AC Milan
25:59 Caption: Here is a change. Alberto Grassi is going off and Edoardo Reja gives the last tactical orders to Carlos Carmona (Atalanta).
26:13 Event: Substitution by Atalanta
26:17 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
26:33 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
26:35 Event: Ball out of play
26:37 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) missed a great opportunity! He jumped for a cross and headed towards goal from the penalty spot, but the ball sailed well wide of the left post!
26:59 Caption: Substitution. Keisuke Honda (AC Milan) replaces M'Baye Niang.
27:00 Event: Substitution by AC Milan
27:11 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
27:29 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
28:18 Caption: Atalanta seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. They are waiting for the right moment to create new attacking opportunities.
28:35 Event: Ball out of play
28:37 Caption: A pass by Maximiliano Moralez (Atalanta) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for AC Milan.
28:51 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
29:27 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) serves up a nice cross, but Gianluigi Donnarumma punches the ball away.
30:14 Event: Ball out of play
30:22 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball is out of play. Atalanta will have a throw-in.
30:28 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
30:36 Event: Ball out of play
31:07 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
31:31 Event: Foul by AC Milan
31:45 Caption: Piero Giacomelli shows a yellow card to Davide Calabria (AC Milan), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
31:54 Event: Yellow card by AC Milan
32:12 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
32:15 Event: Foul by Atalanta
32:23 Caption: Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) shows too much aggression during an attacking move and ends up fouling his opponent.
32:39 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
32:56 Event: Shots off target by Atalanta
32:57 Event: Ball out of play
33:01 Caption: That was close by Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta)! He receives a pass on the edge of the box and shoots, but the ball goes inches wide of the left post.
33:13 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
33:33 Event: Ball out of play
33:35 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) delivers a lovely cross into the penalty area. Nevertheless, an opposition defender is alert and averts the danger with a brilliant clearance. The ball is out of play. AC Milan will have a chance to score from a corner.
33:49 Event: Corner by AC Milan
33:50 Event: Shots on target by AC Milan
34:03 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will send the ball into the penalty box.
34:45 Caption: A nice cross arrived in the box from the corner kick and found the head of Luiz Adriano (AC Milan). He steered the ball towards the bottom left corner, but one of the defenders is there to cover the goalkeeper and keep it out.
35:01 Event: Foul by Atalanta
35:32 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
35:48 Event: Shots off target by AC Milan
35:50 Event: Ball out of play
35:52 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) climbs high to meet a cross on the edge of the box, but it's a poor header and goes well wide of the left post.
36:10 Event: Clearance by Atalanta
36:24 Caption: We can have a look at the statistics now, particularly the total attempts – 8:15.
36:35 Event: Ball out of play
36:41 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
36:51 Event: Ball out of play
37:07 Event: Throw-in by Atalanta
37:50 Event: Foul by AC Milan
37:56 Caption: Alessio Cerci (AC Milan) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
38:05 Event: Yellow card by AC Milan
38:14 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
38:27 Caption: Carlos Bacca (AC Milan) is booked for saying more than Piero Giacomelli was willing to tolerate.
39:06 Event: Foul by AC Milan
39:11 Caption: Luiz Adriano (AC Milan) knocks his opponent down with an over-the-top tackle. Atalanta have been awarded a free kick.
39:46 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
39:49 Event: Ball out of play
40:09 Event: Clearance by AC Milan
40:19 Caption: The free kick is delivered by Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) but it's not one of his best and is easily cleared.
40:28 Event: Ball out of play
40:32 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Atalanta.
40:35 Caption: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.
40:53 Event: Corner by Atalanta
41:11 Caption: Cristian Raimondi (Atalanta) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Gianluigi Donnarumma intercepts the ball.
41:27 Event: Foul by AC Milan
41:31 Event: Indirect free-kick by Atalanta
41:42 Event: Ball out of play
41:56 Event: Throw-in by AC Milan
43:22 Event: Offside by Atalanta
43:23 Event: Indirect free-kick by AC Milan
43:25 Caption: The linesman raises his flag for offside before Mauricio Pinilla (Atalanta) heads on.
43:26 Event: Foul by Atalanta
43:32 Event: Yellow card by Atalanta

The home team tried to find the weakness in the opposition's defence mostly using rapid counter-attacks. On the other hand, long balls and crosses were the main weapons of the away team.
    

    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
The match between AC Milan and Atalanta was an intriguing yet ultimately frustrating affair, ending in a goalless draw that left both sets of fans hoping for more. Held at the San Siro, this fixture saw moments of potential that failed to manifest into concrete scoring opportunities, despite the efforts and tactical maneuvers by both sides.

The first half kicked off with AC Milan at the helm, eager to assert their dominance at home. However, the initial minute saw the ball quickly going out of play, a foreshadowing of a match consistent with interruptions and stoppage events. Atalanta sought to capitalize early, initiating a throw-in. The game's flow was immediately disrupted by a foul from Atalanta within the second minute, granting AC Milan a direct free-kick opportunity, although once more, it led to a foul, this time committed by AC Milan.

As the minutes ticked by, the match showed little progress in terms of concrete offensive actions. Atalanta tried to regroup and stabilize their game, yet the frequent ball-outs and throw-ins suggested a game wrestling for control. AC Milan's Alessio Cerci momentarily appeared to break the deadlock, attempting to find his teammate with a promising pass. However, Atalanta's defense remained vigilant, clearing the threat effectively.

The narrative of missed opportunities continued as Atalanta's Boukary Drame made an assertive run towards goal, only to be thwarted by the alert defense. A ferocious yet failed cross from Andrea Poli and an interception disrupting the short passes between Andrea Poli and M'Baye Niang painted a picture of a game where defensive commitments overshadowed offensive creativity.

As frustrations grew, the game turned more physical with frequent fouls. Notably, AC Milan's Luca Antonelli made an attempt that was rapidly cleared to safety by Atalanta. This defensive rigidity was matched by tactical set-pieces, like a floating ball from Cerci during a corner that failed to find any contact among teammates. AC Milan showed a spark of potential when Carlos Bacca broke into the penalty area, only to be blocked effectively, displaying Atalanta’s resilient defensive organization.

Midway through the first half, Atalanta was forced to make an early substitution due to an injury sustained by Boukary Drame, bringing on Gianpaolo Bellini. This change, however, did little to alter the momentum on the pitch. Both sides traded numerous throw-ins, fouls, and offside calls with yellow cards emerging from both camps; Mattia De Sciglio for AC Milan and Luca Cigarini for Atalanta. Interestingly, Riccardo Montolivo attempted to conjure offensive opportunities through wonderful long passes, each strategically countered by Atalanta's astute defending.

The curtain fell on the first half with a distinct sense of unfulfilled potential. AC Milan had their moments but were brewing long passes and crosses with inconsistency, while Atalanta relied on swift counter-attacks that failed to puncture Milan's defenses. Despite efforts, the scoreboard remained unchanged, reflecting a sterile first half devoid of clinical finishes.

The second half saw immediate action with AC Milan making a substitution, bringing on Davide Calabria to replace Mattia De Sciglio. This half mirrored its predecessor, frequently disrupted by fouls and offsides, starting with Carlos Bacca caught offside early within the first minute. Atalanta responded with firm defensive play, frequently clearing Milan's efforts while reasserting their midfield control and slowing down the tempo to dictate the game.

The cards kept flowing, with Atalanta's Mauricio Pinilla booked for a reckless tackle. AC Milan, on the other hand, had moments of brilliance like M'Baye Niang's impressive solo run, only to be denied by Marco Sportiello's fabulous save. Gianluigi Donnarumma showcased his shot-stopping abilities, particularly when Luca Cigarini’s header was brilliantly parried away.

Both teams kept shuffling their lineups in search of that elusive breakthrough. AC Milan's Juraj Kucka made way for Luiz Adriano, while Atalanta took off Alberto Grassi for Carlos Carmona. Despite the substitutions injecting fresh legs and new strategies, neither team managed to crack the stalemate. Promising attacks fizzled out into misdirected shots, superb defensive clearances, and a balanced tug-of-war in the midfield.

In the dying minutes, Atalanta continued to push forward, accessing scoring positions yet lacking the precision to convert their opportunities. German Denis came on for Mauricio Pinilla as the clock wound down, the final tactical gamble by Atalanta. However, the game's trend of near-misses persisted. A glorious header by Luca Antonelli, climbing high to meet a cross from a free kick, went wayward, summing up Milan's evening of unfulfilled attempts.

The final whistle blew, cementing the match into a goal-drought narrative. While both teams displayed their defensive prowess, the lack of a decisive finishing touch spoke volumes about their offensive impediments. The statistical reflection of the game showed Atalanta with more shots, yet AC Milan's few on-target efforts were remarkably stifled by the vigilant Marco Sportiello.

Both managers would leave the stadium contemplating the missed opportunities and strategizing for forthcoming fixtures. The number of fouls, the persistent offsides, and especially the frequency of the ball being played out of bounds highlighted how each team struggled to channel their ball possession into impactful offensive plays. The game’s tempo was continuously disrupted, hampering any continuity that could lead to sustained pressure or a definitive attacking rhythm.

In summary, the match between AC Milan and Atalanta demonstrated the complexity and intricacies of Serie A football. Despite the absence of goals, the match was not lacking in effort, strategic maneuvering, and glimpses of individual talent. Each side showed flashes of potential but fell short of the clinical edge required to secure victory. For AC Milan, the strategy of long balls and crosses awaited better execution, while Atalanta's counter-attacks begged for sharper precision and finishing touches. The goalless draw would serve as a critical point of analysis for both teams as they moved forward in the season, seeking to gild their defenses with offensive gold.
